service.title: Entry Point Regulation (EPR)
service.documentation: Entry Point Regulation aims to mitigate the risk of reflected cross-site scripting (XSS), cross-site script inclusion (XSSI), and cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks by demarcating the areas of an application which are intended to be externally referencable. A specified policy is applied on external requests for all non-demarcated resources.

http-header.documentation: Servers may request the protections outlined by Entry Point Regulation (EPR) by sending an EPR HTTP response header field along with a response.
